message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a method for scene text detection using neural networks, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The method involves adaptive text region representation, which is a technique used in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of neural networks for text region refinement also falls under the category of deep learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the results of experiments on various benchmarks, which is a common practice in information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the proposed method can be used for natural language processing tasks such as text translation, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL).
